snippet: Banks across the world have paid about $321 billion in fines since the 2007-2008 financial crisis as regulators stepped up scrutiny, according to a note by the Boston Consulting Group....

headline.main: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86

lead_paragraph: Banks across the world have paid about $321 billion in fines since the 2007-2008 financial crisis as regulators stepped up scrutiny, according to a note by the Boston Consulting Group.
